name: DROD: Smitemaster's Selection Expansions 11+12
summary:
Smitemaster's Selections are level expansion packs for DROD. These Caravel-produced level collections add to the official story of DROD with quality writing and voice acting. You will have about a hundred new and unique puzzles to solve in each Smitemaster's Selection bundle.

Expansions 11+12 contain these episodes:

Finding the First Truth
Flood Warning
